CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 30, 1973, pg. 1 reads: "Courier NNPA Awardees - New Pittsburgh Courier staffers were among the 1973 Merit Award winners at the 33rd annual convention of the National newspaper, Publishers Association held in Houston, Texas last week. Proud winners holding trophies and plaques are from left to right: General manager James D. Lewis, City Editor Hazel Garland and Reporter Tom Stokes. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of James D. Lewis, Hazel Garland, and Tom Stokes, holding National Newspaper Publishers Association 1973 Merit awards and trophies, standing in front of New Pittsburgh Courier Newspaper building, 315 Carson Street, South Side, horizontal format
CatSubject_tab: Group portraits--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Garland, Hazel.Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.New Pittsburgh Courier Publishing Co.South Side (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Lewis, James D.
